outputs.output_descr: On the 19th July 2012 three regions of Georgia: Kakheti, Mtskheta-Mtianeti and Samtskhe-Javakheti experienced a devastating hailstorm, combined with strong winds and followed by heavy rainfall that caused heavy damages. Since the Government of Georgia does not have the capacity to conduct a thorough recovery needs assessment and develops an integrated recovery framework, and has approached UNDP and the World Bank for technical assistance. UNDP and the World Bank have agreed to jointly support the Government of Georgia with conducting a thorough recovery needs assessment as well as the development of an integrated recovery framework.

project_title: Immediate response to 2012 Natural Disaster in Georgia
